name: Fabled Realm Resurrection
text:
When this card is activated: You can Set 1 "Fabled" Spell/Trap from your Deck, except "Fabled Realm Resurrection". Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when your "Fabled" monster is Synchro Summoned. Once per turn: You can discard 1 "Fabled" card, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Draw 1 card.
● Special Summon 1 "Fabled" monster from your GY or banishment.
You can only activate 1 "Fabled Realm Resurrection" per turn.
